regen.absent_element: visual indication when the call cannot connect initially
regen.new_specification: If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver.

regen.absent_element: warning for impending disconnection during an active call
regen.new_specification: The system shall provide an audible and visual warning to the driver prior to an impending disconnection during an active call.
The system shall provide a visual indication to the driver if the system is not able to connect the call.

label: If the system is not able to connect the call, an audible and visual indication shall be provided to the driver.
absence: the visual indication shall be provided
